FamilyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.Description: Former president of Trump Briarcliff Manor Development LLC (F/K/A Briar Hall Development LLC), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and provides back office support functions to other entities.
FamilyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.Business: Trump Briarcliff Manor Development LLC (F/K/A Briar Hall Development LLC)
